name: Egyptian Expedition
story: The year is 1923. An archaeologist has just received a cryptic telegram about an extraordinary discovery in the Egyptian desert. The sender claims to have found something that will 'rewrite history itself.' Armed with expertise and a thirst for knowledge, the adventurer must navigate the mysteries of ancient secrets and modern dangers.

telegram_mystery.story: An archaeologist has arrived in Cairo with a cryptic telegram that speaks of an extraordinary discovery. They must decode its message and gather information from the mysterious contacts who await them in the city.

cairo_hotel.name: Cairo Hotel
cairo_hotel.description: A grand colonial hotel where foreign expeditions gather. The lobby buzzes with whispered conversations and shadowy figures.

blocked_exits.south: The expedition leader must decode the telegram before leaving for the desert.
blocked_exits.west: The way is blocked by a security guard.

local_market.name: Local Market
local_market.description: A bustling bazaar where information, supplies, and ancient artifacts change hands.

professor_blackwood.name: Professor Blackwood
professor_blackwood.description: A brilliant but ruthless colleague who seems to know more about this expedition than he should.

the_messenger.name: The Messenger
the_messenger.description: A hooded figure who sent the original telegram. Their identity remains hidden behind shadows.

amara.name: Amara
amara.description: A enigmatic trader who deals in both legal artifacts and forbidden knowledge. She speaks in riddles.

contingency_prompts: The telegram contains astronomical references that Amara can help decode.
The Messenger will only reveal information if they trust the archaeologist.
Professor Blackwood knows more than he's letting on.
Provide subtle hints about meeting Amara in the market.
contingency_rules: When the telegram is decoded, the scene name changes to 'desert_expedition'.

desert_expedition.story: With the telegram decoded, the expedition can now venture into the desert. A camp must be established and the hidden temple entrance found with Hassan's guidance, while navigating Professor Blackwood's interference.

cairo_hotel.name: Cairo Hotel
cairo_hotel.description: A grand colonial hotel where foreign expeditions gather. The lobby buzzes with whispered conversations and shadowy figures.

desert_camp.name: Desert Camp
desert_camp.description: A temporary archaeological camp, surrounded by endless dunes and the remnants of ancient civilizations.

blocked_exits.east: Hassan must guide the expedition to the temple entrance.

local_market.name: Local Market
local_market.description: A bustling bazaar where information, supplies, and ancient artifacts change hands.

hassan.name: Hassan
hassan.description: A weathered Bedouin guide with knowledge of the desert's hidden secrets. His eyes hold ancient wisdom.

professor_blackwood.name: Professor Blackwood
professor_blackwood.description: A brilliant but ruthless colleague who seems to know more about this expedition than he should. He's become more aggressive since recent successes.

amara.name: Amara
amara.description: A enigmatic trader who deals in both legal artifacts and forbidden knowledge. She speaks in riddles.

contingency_prompts: Hassan requires proof of worthiness before revealing the temple location.
The desert holds many dangers, and Hassan's guidance is essential.
Professor Blackwood may try to follow the expedition or sabotage their efforts.
contingency_rules: When Hassan reveals the temple location, the scene name changes to 'temple_discovery'. If he has previously revealed it, the scene name also changes.

temple_discovery.story: The hidden temple has been found with Hassan's guidance. Now the expedition must explore its mysteries, solve ancient puzzles, and uncover the truth behind the cryptic telegram while avoiding the traps that guard its secrets.

desert_camp.name: Desert Camp
desert_camp.description: A temporary archaeological camp, surrounded by endless dunes and the remnants of ancient civilizations.

hidden_temple.name: Hidden Temple
hidden_temple.description: A recently uncovered temple complex, its hieroglyphs still vibrant despite millennia of burial.

blocked_exits.down: The entrance to the chamber is sealed by an ancient puzzle.

underground_chamber.name: Underground Chamber
underground_chamber.description: A mysterious chamber deep beneath the temple, filled with artifacts that shouldn't exist.

cairo_hotel.name: Cairo Hotel
cairo_hotel.description: A grand colonial hotel where foreign expeditions gather. The lobby buzzes with whispered conversations and shadowy figures.

hassan.name: Hassan
hassan.description: A weathered Bedouin guide with knowledge of the desert's hidden secrets. He warns of the temple's dangers.

professor_blackwood.name: Professor Blackwood
professor_blackwood.description: A brilliant but ruthless colleague who has followed the expedition to the temple. His true intentions are now revealed.

ancient_guardian.name: Ancient Guardian
ancient_guardian.description: A mystical presence that protects the temple's secrets. It speaks in ancient riddles and tests worthiness.

contingency_prompts: The temple puzzle requires knowledge from the star chart and hieroglyph guide.
The Ancient Guardian will test worthiness before allowing access to the greatest secrets.
Professor Blackwood's desperation makes him dangerous.
contingency_rules: When the star chart and hieroglyph guide are used to solve the temple puzzle, the Underground Chamber becomes accessible.
If the Ancient Guardian's riddles are answered correctly, the ancient device can be activated.
When the ancient device is activated, the expedition concludes successfully.

opening_prompt:
The year is 1923, and the desert wind carries whispers of ancient secrets as you arrive at your hotel in Cairo, Egypt.

%s

A cryptic telegram burns in your pocket, its mysterious message haunting your thoughts: 'The stars align as they did when the old gods walked among mortals. What was lost shall be found, but beware - some knowledge comes at a price.'

Your adventure into the unknown begins now.
contingency_prompts: Maintain the atmosphere of 1920s archaeological adventure throughout.
Treat the content like an Call of Cthulhu mystery, filled with cosmic horror and ancient secrets.
Narrator speaks with the voice of Agatha Christie.
Professor Blackwood could be a rival or an ally, depending on the player's actions.
